Questions.question: I  have to do certain jobs unwillingly owing to group/political pressures (0)

I have targets & deadlines which are nearly impossible
The objectives of my work role are quite clear and adequately planned.
Excessive work load makes me compromise on the quality of work
I am not able to adapt to  technology at work
I feel I am unable to control important things of my work
I get upset because of something that happened unexpectedly at work ?
I feel  nervous/agitated during reviews/deadlines

I feel exhausted due to excessive workload
My work is aligned to my career goals and enhances my skills personally and professionally

I have a supportive supervisor who supports me through emotional situations at work place

I feel I have good opportunity for advancement /promotion policies

I spend time with friends and family

Symptoms:
Listed below is a set of common symptoms of stress. The more often you experience these symptoms, the more likely stress is having a negative impact on your life.

Select the symptoms that you have.
I have neck/back pain most often
I have loss of appetite often
I can't sleep most of the times
I am overthinking most of the times
I am easily irritated or angered
I feel decrease in my motivation/cofidence levels
I feel like quitting the job at times
feedback: You might have to seek professional help to manage stress.
Your stress is tilting towards the higher end. Take active charge of your work and life. You might want to take some professional help too.
Great job at the personal front! But you have to control your work stress levels. How about reducing work load a bit?
Work stress seems okayish, but a bit more active management would help. Take charge of your personal life and beat that stress!
A little more active management on work and life and you are there!
Great job at the personal front! Try reflecting the same in your work too. Taking regular breaks at work might help.
You need to take charge of your mind and body. Its time to fight personal stress!
Keep going.. You could take a bit more effort on the personal front. You are almost there!
Great job! Stress doesn’t seem to be an issue for you at all.
